data.actual_result: You see the person's nickname that is his/her default
data.expected_result: You should usually see the nickname that was changed in the server
data.short_description: Showing persons default nickname rather than the nickname chosen in the server when copying a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any server chat - Press and hold a message send by someone else (that has changed his nickname into something else in the server)
